ygData.subject: Re: DrillBit
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Drillbit, we have a spare room towards the back of the cave.  No one is using it at the moment, you may take that as your quarters until Megatron returns.

::DarkMouse::

"Drillbit, we have a spare room towards the back of the cave.  No one 
is using it at the moment, you may take that as your quarters until 
Megatron returns. If you like"
Even with her memory restored, part of a more subserviant program was 
installed in her.  She was more of a slave now than she ever was and 
was compeled to serve.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Ok, I'm going to look around a bit."
> He walks on.
